scripts.wasm:build-run: npm run wasm:configure && npm run wasm:build && npm run wasm:run
scripts.wasm:reconfigure: npm run wasm:clean && EM_CACHE=$PWD/build/emscripten_cache emcmake cmake --preset wasm-debug -DFETCHCONTENT_UPDATES_DISCONNECTED=OFF -DFETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISCONNECTED=OFF
scripts.wasm:rebuild-run: npm run wasm:reconfigure && npm run wasm:build && npm run wasm:run
scripts.wasm:build-run:release: npm run wasm:configure:release && npm run wasm:build:release && npm run wasm:run:release
scripts.wasm:reconfigure:release: npm run wasm:clean && EM_CACHE=$PWD/build/emscripten_cache emcmake cmake --preset wasm-release -DFETCHCONTENT_UPDATES_DISCONNECTED=OFF -DFETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISCONNECTED=OFF
scripts.wasm:rebuild-run:release: npm run wasm:reconfigure:release && npm run wasm:build:release && npm run wasm:run:release
